name: Aztecs
bonus: Military units - including Siege Weapons, Warships but no Monks - are created 18% faster

bonus: Stable units cost -15/20% in Castle/Imperial Age

bonus: Town Centers cost -50% wood in Castle Age

name: Burmese
bonus: Infantry +1 Attack per Age (Starting in Feudal Age)

name: Byzantines

name: Celts
bonus: Can convert sheep even if enemy are next to them
imperialAgeTech: Furor Celtica (Siege Workshop units have +40% hit points

bonus: Start with +3 Villagers but -50 wood, -200 food

name: Incas
bonus: Villagers affected by Infantry Blacksmith upgrades
castleAgeTech: Andean Sling (Skirmishers, Slingers and Genitours no minimum range)

name: Khamer
